roleset.name: to provide an index
roleset.note: INDEX-V NOTES: Frames file for 'index' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from index.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: Based on historical rates of return , Mr. Anderson reckons [0] [a 100 % stock portfolio]-1 , indexed [*]-1 to the market , would have kept up with tuition and taxes in the 20th century .
